name: PreconditionsForTreatmentPreferences
title: Preconditions for Treatment Preferences
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Concepts that describe the preconditions which must be met in order for a person's preferences for certain treatments or interventions to be applicable.),(Data Element Scope: This data element expresses the precondition that must be true for expressed treatment preferences to be applicable.),(Inclusion Criteria: ),(Exclusion Criteria: )

concept.display: Information to tell doctors if my health deteriorates due to a terminal illness and I am unable to interact meaningfully with family, friends, or surroundings [Reported]
Information to tell doctors if I have a severe, irreversible brain injury or illness and can't dress, feed, or bathe myself, or communicate my medical wishes, but can be kept alive [Reported]
